entry.title: Sole Comfort – Foot Cream
entry.summary:
Vendor: Willow Springs Emu Oil Canada
Type: Emu Oil Skin Care
Price: 20.45

Sole comfort natural foot cream is a must-have if you’re looking to keep your feet healthy and moisturized all year long. Our emu oil foot cream is a blend of ingredients combined with our Grade-A Pure Emu Oil that specifically target inflammation, swelling, and pain. 

Sole Comfort Foot Cream contains all of the ingredients needed for soft healthy feet.  Emu oil penetrates through all layers of your skin to provide deep moisturizing and prevent cracking.  Tea Tree Oil helps reduce fungal infections such as Athlete’s foot, cools. MSM helps increase blood flow and reduce swelling, acting as a natural pain reliever.   Menthol provided a cooling and soothing feeling to leave your feet feeling rejuvenated and relaxed. 

~section 2~

Ingredients:   Water, Emu Oil, Aloe Vera, Emulsifying wax, Glycerin, Menthol, MSM, Cetyl Alcohol, Calendula Oil, Shea Butter, Allantoin, Tea Tree Oil, Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E, Optiphen Ultra.

Directions: Apply 2-3 times daily as required for smooth, healthy feet. 

Benefits:

  • Anti-inflammation from Emu Oil
  • Natural pain relief from MSM
  • Cool and soothing Menthol
  • Antibacterial, antifungal, cooling Tea Tree Oil

entry.title: All Natural Sunblock
entry.summary:
Vendor: Willow Springs Emu Oil
Type: Emu Oil Skin Care
Price: 24.35 - 40.95 (2 variants)

Our Moisturizing Natural Sunblock is formulated with Zinc Oxide, natures best known complete block for UVA and UVB protection. Zinc Oxide is the premier natural, mineral sunblock ingredient on the market today. Zinc Oxide physically blocks harmful damaging solar rays. The mineral deflects rays to help protect and prevent accelerated deterioration of the skin. Safe, effective and broad spectrum.

Our sunblock not only protects but effectively nourishes and improves the skins overall texture. We use carefully selected ingredients that help to improve the skin cell health as well as provide significant nourishment and moisture.  

Benefits:

  • Healthy alternative to harsh chemical products
  • All natural ingredients with no synthetic fillers
  • Rehydrates skin and provides a protective barrier from outdoor conditions.
  • Ideal for all skin types including troubled and allergy prone
  • Vitamin E as added protection against premature aging of skin.
  • Made locally on Vancouver Island

~section 2~

Ingredients:   Water, Emu Oil, Aloe Vera, Emulsifying wax, Zinc Oxide, Glycerin, Squalene, Rose Hip Seed Oil, Cetyl Alcohol, Vitamin E, Vitamin B, Optiphen Ultra, Vitamin A, Essential Oil Scent

entry.title: Whole Pure Emu Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Willow Springs Emu Oil Canada
Type: Pure Emu Oil
Price: 15.00 - 82.00 (3 variants)

Willow Springs pure refined Emu Oil offers amazing skin protection benefits, including tissue healing for scars and wrinkles, anti-inflammatory properties, and disinfection. Willow Springs only uses Certified “Fully Refined – Grade A” emu oil, as our cornerstone ingredient for all of our products. 


Throughout the world, Emu Oil has been used as a safe and effective natural healing treatment for the face and body including burns, cuts, scars, eczema, dry skin, bug bites and other skin irritations. Willow Springs Emu Oil can also be used for hair growth and as a natural makeup remover.  

~section 2~

Ingredients:  99.88 % Pure Emu Oil, 0.12 % vitamin E (added at the time of refining for its anti-oxidant properties to increase shelf-life)

American Emu Association Certified “Fully Refined” Emu Oil – Grade A.  A gentle, physical refining process with superfine screens and natural absorbent clays results in a superior, premium quality, natural, pure emu oil with high therapeutic and biological activity.  No harsh chemicals or solvents are used in the refining process.

Emu Oil Benefits:

  • Penetrates and hydrates all layers of skin
  • Reduces the appearance of scars and fine lines 
  • Hypoallergenic and all-natural
  • Promotes healthy hair follicles to assist with hair growth
  • Decreases swelling and skin irritation
  • Great carrier oil 

Pure Emu Oil Naturally Contains:

  • Omega 3, Omega 6, and Omega 9 fatty acids
  • Vitamin A - antioxidant and skin repair 
  • Vitamin K and D - essential vitamins
  • Oleic acid - proven skin cell regenerator and anti-wrinkle agent
  • Linoleic acid - helps to ease muscle aches and joint pain
  • Sapogens - proven skin softener
  • Terpines - antiseptic properties

entry.title: Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer with Zinc Sunblock
entry.summary:
Vendor: Willow Springs Emu Oil Canada
Type: Emu Oil Skin Care
Price: 24.35

Willow Springs Anti Wrinkle Moisturizer with Zinc Sunblock is formulated with Pure Whole Emu Oil which has a recognized SPF of 8 and Zinc Oxide one of the best known natural sunblocks.  Zinc Oxide is known to block the full spectrum of UVA and UVB rays, incredibly effectively, all by itself making it truly the best natural sunblock available. To these two power houses we add other top quality natural ingredients for a superior moisturizing cream. ~section 2~

Ingredients: Water, Emu Oil, Aloe Vera, Glycerin, Emulsifying wax, Squalene, Rose Hip Seed Oil, Cetyl Alcohol, Vitamin E, Vitamin B, Optiphen Ultra, Vitamin A, Ylang Ylang Essential Oil, and Zinc Oxide

Directions: Slightly thicker than the regular moisturizer so does take slightly longer to rub in for the invisible look.  Can be applied as frequently as needed.

Benefits:  

  • A healthy natural alternative to Harsh Chemical Sunscreens
  • Made with micronized inorganic Zinc Oxide which does not produce the white look
  • Does not absorb into the skin like chemical sunscreens do.
  • Top quality ingredients rehydrate the skin and provide a protective barrier from outdoor conditions
  • Made locally on Vancouver Island

entry.title: Hand & Body Lotion
entry.summary:
Vendor: Willow Springs Emu Oil Canada
Type: Emu Oil Skin Care
Price: 12.25 - 20.45 (4 variants)

With Emu Oil’s amazing ability to penetrate ALL layers of your skin combined with the healing benefits of Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, our Hand and Body Lotion deeply moisturizes and nourishes your skin and the tissue beneath. Our Hand and Body lotion provides fast absorbing, long lasting protection to soften and smooth your skin.   ~section 2~

Ingredients:   Water, Emu Oil, Aloe Vera, Glycerin, Emulsifying wax, Shea Butter, Cetyl Alcohol, Evening Primrose, Vitamin E, Optiphen Ultra, Ylang Ylang Essential Oil

Directions: Apply 2-3 times daily as required

Benefits:

  • Made from all natural ingredients with no synthetic fillers
  • Rehydrates skin and provides a protective barrier from outdoor conditions.
  • Ideal for all skin types including troubled and allergy prone
  • Made locally on Vancouver Island
  • Penetrating anti-inflammatory effects of Emu Oil
  • Vitamin E as added protection against premature aging of skin.

entry.title: Emu Oil Lip Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Willow Springs Emu Oil Canada
Type: Emu Oil Skin Care
Price: 4.95

Willow Springs all natural Lip Balm is an ultra rich formula that protects heals and nourishes. Lightly flavoured our lip balm is made from a combination of Aloe Vera, Almond Oil, and Vitamin E. Emu Oil is easily absorbed into the lips to begin the soothing process. ~section 2~

Ingredients: Emu Oil (50%) local Bees Wax, Aloe Vera, Almond Oil, Natural Vitamin E Oil, Essential Oil Flavouring

Directions: Apply 2-3 times daily as required

Benefits:

  • Aides in protecting from sun damage
  • Made from all natural ingredients with no synthetic fillers
  • Rehydrates skin and provides a protective barrier from outdoor conditions.
  • Made locally on Vancouver Island

entry.title: Deep Heat Pain Cream
entry.summary:
Vendor: Willow Springs Emu Oil Canada
Type: Emu Oil Skin Care
Price: 19.45 - 32.75 (2 variants)

Our Deep Heat Penetrating Cream starts with our cornerstone ingredient, whole pure Emu Oil, to this we add natural ingredients to support your body’s own pain fighting system.  Our natural blend of Emu Oil, CMO, Camphor, Oil of Wintergreen and Boswellia with the deep heating of Capsicum is great for a variety of conditions. It will alleviate aches and pains associated with sore muscles, injuries, inflammation and arthritic pain.  Research studies have shown Emu Oil to have significant anti-inflammatory properties comparable to some oral pain medications, with out the negative side effects, and is an excellent trans-dermal carrier of the other pain reducing ingredients. This balm is excellent for sports-related injuries including sprains, pulled tendons and bruising.  If applied prior to strenuous activity it works well as a preventative balm. ~section 2~

Ingredients:   Water, Emu Oil, Emulsifying wax. MSM, Glucosamine, CMO. Glycerin. Menthol, Capsicum, Oil of Wintergreen, Boswellia, Camphor, Optiphen Ultra

Directions: Massage into sore muscles and joints 2-3 times a day.  It is beneficial to pre-treat muscles prior to strenuous activity.

Benefits:

  • Penetrating anti-inflammatory effects of Emu Oil, CMO, Camphor, Oil of Wintergreen and Boswellia with the deep heating of Capsicum.
  • MSM helps increase blood supply, reducing muscle spasms and helps restore cell wall flexibility and permeability thus reducing inflammation and pain
  • Glucosamine is a cartilage-builder that slows joint damage and is particularly useful against arthritis
  • CMO helps to significantly reduce joint pain and stiffness on a wide range of arthritic conditions
  • Pain relieving

entry.title: Rejuvenating Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Willow Springs Emu Oil Canada
Type: Emu Oil Skin Care
Price: 21.50 - 24.35 (3 variants)

SAME PRODUCT, NEW NAME, NEW LOOK

With Emu Oil, Aloe Vera and Vitamins A, B, E

Our Anti-Wrinkle Emu Oil Moisturizing cream has been formulated to effectively nourish and improve the skin's overall texture and elasticity by uniting carefully selected ingredients that reduce the signs of ageing resulting in a healthy even complexion. This Emu Oil cream helps to improve your skin cell health as well as provides significant nourishment.  It also helps with skin rejuvenation, cell renewal, and minimizing the look of fine lines. We have chosen to use Ylang Ylang essential oil to give our face cream a light essence while providing benefits to your skin.

Also available in unscented or with Zinc Oxide Sunblock.~section 2~

Ingredients:   Water, Emu Oil, Aloe Vera, Glycerin, Emulsifying wax, Squalene, Rose Hip Seed Oil, Cetyl Alcohol, Vitamin E, Vitamin B, Optiphen Ultra, Vitamin A, Ylang Ylang Essential Oil

Directions: This is an effective and luxurious anti-wrinkle product for both Day and Night moisturizing. Our anti-ageing cream is made primarily for the face but may be used all over the body for a surge of moisture.

Benefits:

  • A healthy alternative to harsh chemical products
  • All-natural ingredients with no synthetic fillers
  • Rehydrates skin and provides a protective barrier from outdoor conditions.
  • Ideal for all skin types including troubled and allergy-prone
  • Vitamin E as added protection against premature ageing of the skin.
  • Made locally on Vancouver Island

entry.title: Bulk Pure Emu Oil 18.9-litre
entry.summary:
Vendor: Willow Springs Emu Oil Canada
Type: Bulk Pure Emu Oils
Price: 0.00

Emu Oil is a little known treasure from Australia. Willow Springs Emu Oil is Certified “Fully Refined – Grade A”.  The active substances in emu oil offer amazing skin protection benefits, including tissue healing (scars), anti-inflammatory, sun-protective and disinfectant properties. For this reason Willow Springs has chosen this oil as our cornerstone ingredient for all of our products. This powerhouse oil treats such a wide range of health conditions that it could clear out your medicine cabinet.  Through out the world this oil has been used as a safe and effective natural healing treatment for burns, cuts, scars, eczema, dry skin and other skin irritations. Emu Oil is also a great makeup remover.

Totally void of phospholipids, just like human skin allowing for better deeper absorption.

As a skin care Building block when combined with other natural ingredients it does not add to the pollution and destruction of our living oceans.

Excluded from free shipping offer.

Looking for information on wholesale? Click here.

Ingredients:   99.88 % Pure Emu Oil, 0.12 % vitamin E (added at the time of refining for its anti-oxidant properties to increase shelf-life)

American Emu  Association Certified as “Fully Refined” – Grade A.  A gentle, physical refining process (super fine screens down to 1 micron in size and natural absorbent clays) are used resulting is a superior, premium Quality, natural pure Emu oil with high therapeutic biological activity.  No harsh chemicals or solvents are used in the refining process.

Benefits:

  • Provides natural healing benefits as opposed to expensive and often inadequate pharmaceutical medications
  • Hydrates and plumps skin, reducing the appearance of fine lines
  • Hypoallergenic because its biological makeup is very similar to that of human skin

Naturally contains:

  • all Omega 3, Omega6, and Omega9 fatty acids
  • Vitamin A, a known skin repairer and antioxidant
  • Vitamin K and D, both essential vitamins
  • Oleic acid, a proven skin cell regenerator and anti-wrinkle agent
  • Linoleic acid, which helps to ease muscle aches and joint pain
  • Sapogens, proven skin softeners
  • Terpines, known antiseptics
